scripts.buildCalculator: cd calculator && yarn install && koinos-sdk-as-cli build-all release 0 calculator.proto && koinos-sdk-as-cli run-tests
scripts.buildCalculator:ubuntu: cd calculator && yarn install && koinos-sdk-as-cli build-all release 0 calculator.proto && koinos-sdk-as-cli run-tests && yarn integration-tests
scripts.buildChat: cd chat && yarn install && koinos-sdk-as-cli build-all release 0 chat.proto
scripts.buildControlledContractUpdate: cd controlled_contract_update && yarn install && koinos-sdk-as-cli build-all --generate_authorize release 0 update.proto
scripts.buildImmutable: cd immutable && yarn install && koinos-sdk-as-cli build-all release 0 immutable.proto
scripts.buildNft: cd nft && yarn install && koinos-sdk-as-cli build-all release 0 nft.proto
scripts.buildStaking: cd staking && yarn install && koinos-sdk-as-cli build-all release 0 staking.proto
scripts.buildToken: cd token && yarn install && koinos-sdk-as-cli build-all release 0 token.proto && koinos-sdk-as-cli run-tests
scripts.buildTransactionStorage: cd transaction_storage && yarn install && koinos-sdk-as-cli build release && koinos-sdk-as-cli run-tests
scripts.buildAll: yarn lint && yarn buildCalculator && yarn buildChat && yarn buildControlledContractUpdate && yarn buildImmutable && yarn buildNft && yarn buildStaking && yarn buildToken && yarn buildTransactionStorage
scripts.buildAll:ubuntu: yarn lint && yarn buildCalculator:ubuntu && yarn buildChat && yarn buildControlledContractUpdate && yarn buildImmutable && yarn buildNft && yarn buildStaking && yarn buildToken && yarn buildTransactionStorage
